fields.description:
On iOS 6, adding contacts through Kitchen Sink -> Phone -> Add Contact does not add a contact and also no response for failure to add contact is shown when Kitchen Sink does not have permission to contacts
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchen Sink -> Phone -> Add Contacts
2. Enter details and click on Add Contact button

Actual: No response is shown. Also an error is shown in console. Find the attached logs.

Expected: There should be an information shown that the app does not have access to contacts (as is shown in other cases in KS for contacts)
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink: On iOS 6, no response to user for unable to add contacts and error in console when Kitchen Sink does not have permission to contacts
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120927181611
Device: iPad3 (v6.0)
Xcode: 4.5
